CustomField.formula:
/*[Inter]*/ IF(CONTAINS($Label.RT_INT_Requete, RecordType.Id), IF($Label.Creer_un_ticket_INTER == $Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE, HYPERLINK($Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE,$Label.Click_Here), HYPERLINK($Label.Creer_un_ticket_INTER+ID_PUDO_REF__c+"&uiculture=en-EN", $Label.Click_Here)),
/*[France only]*/ IF(CONTAINS($Label.RT_France_Requete, RecordType.Id), IF($Label.Creer_un_ticket == $Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE, HYPERLINK($Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE,$Label.Click_Here), HYPERLINK($Label.Creer_un_ticket+ID_PUDO_REF__c+"&uiculture=fr-FR", $Label.Click_Here )),null) )
CustomField.label: Cr√©er un ticket sur Ticket Manager
